trans-unit.source: Creating a connection without specifying attributes

seg-source.mrk: Creating a connection without specifying attributes

target.mrk: Creating a connection without specifying attributes

trans-unit.source: If no attributes are specified, you must specify a databaseName.

seg-source.mrk: If no attributes are specified, you must specify a databaseName.

target.mrk: If no attributes are specified, you must specify a databaseName.

trans-unit.source: opens a connection to an existing database with that name in the current system directory. If the database does not exist, the connection attempt returns an SQLException indicating that the database cannot be found.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> opens a connection to an existing database with that name in the current system directory.
If the database does not exist, the connection attempt returns an SQLException indicating that the database cannot be found.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> opens a connection to an existing database with that name in the current system directory.
If the database does not exist, the connection attempt returns an SQLException indicating that the database cannot be found.
